module.name: Feature Code Admin
module.changelog: *13.0.6.1* FREEPBX-13348 - Fix invalid regexp in featuer code validation *13.0.6* FREEPBX-12232 Issues if there is a feature code conflict *13.0.5* Add BMO Search provider *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow Any valid DTMF digit in any position *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10225 Update validation to allow # *13.0.3* Fixed error reported on the forums *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visual Tweaks and fixes *13.0.1alpha1* Consistency changes *12.0.0* Add Help Text bubbles re FREEPBX-6903 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.3* #5488 *2.10.0.2* #5506 revert of r13179 *2.10.0.1* #5463 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* #4617, #4653, #4655
